typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	container as string ('movies')
}
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> RawMovies
RawMovies foldDown(unroll(actors),
	mapColumn(
		actorName = actors,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenActors
FlattenActors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SilverMovies
